name: Wayward Laughter
description:
_Hey have you heard?, one of the missing kids showed up!.

_Yeah I heard, I also heard someone saying he woke up to the sound of a "clown's laughter"?

_Yeah, Yeah, I heard that too!

_I hope he's okay...

_Man me too, I'm just happy one of those kids actually came back.

_Well all we can do is pray the next kid isn't one of ours.

_Yeah.
